name: Lunar Conquest
description:
Endless style game developed in Coppercube engine. Stop aliens from invading the moon! Use your ship and destroy all invaders!

This game was made for classic and hardcore gamers! With a great level of difficulty. Try to make the best score, for that you will need a lot of skill to dodge enemies, survive!

Hardcore game with total gamer essence, simplicity and constant action, developed for those who like high challenges and make great scores!

The game has two versions, one standard and one with Reshades, with fake HDR effects, better colors and bloom effect.

Welcome to Lunar Conquest!
